TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreatingCookieEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供任何值事件处理程序。The class supplies values to any event handler. 通过使用此类的属性，可以创建自定义身份验证 cookie 时检索用户凭据。By using the properties of this class, you can retrieve user credentials when you create a custom authentication cookie. 类所引发事件时的用户凭据进行了身份验证，它将身份验证 cookie 设置。The class raises the event when it sets the authentication cookie, after the user credentials have been authenticated. 类构造对象，并将其传递给任何事件处理程序。The class constructs a object and passes it to any event handler. 检索用户凭据 ，和属性。You retrieve the user credentials through the , and properties. 属性可以包含任何所需进行身份验证，如标识号的自定义值。The property can contain any custom values that you need in order to authenticate, such as an identification number. 属性指示是否应将身份验证 cookie 保留过去的当前会话。The property indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained past the current session. 设置属性设置为`true`如果您创建身份验证 cookie，以便类不会创建该 cookie。Set the property to `true` if you create the authentication cookie, so that the class does not create the cookie. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序检索中的用户值对象自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 该处理程序将从值保存属性中的身份验证票证和集属性设置为`true`以指示已创建身份验证 cookie。The handler saves the value from the property in the authentication ticket and sets the property to `true` to indicate that the authentication cookie has been created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieIsSet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieIsSet : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已创建身份验证 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie has been created.

value.span: 如果已创建身份验证 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the authentication cookie was created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检查属性来确定是否创建了身份验证 cookie。The class checks the property to determine whether the authentication cookie has been created. 将此值设置为`true`事件处理程序中创建的身份验证 cookie事件。You set this value to `true` if you create an authentication cookie in an event handler for the event. 如果设置为`false`（默认值），类创建身份验证 cookie，这将覆盖已在处理程序中创建任何 cookie事件。If is set to `false` (the default value), the class creates an authentication cookie, This overwrites any cookie that you have created in the handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序检索中的用户值对象自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 属性设置为`true`创建身份验证票证后。The property is set to `true` after the authentication ticket is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomCredential As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取用户提供的其他身份验证值。

span.span: Gets additional authentication values that are provided by the user.

value.span: 进行身份验证所需的除用户名和密码以外的其他自定义值。

span.span: The custom values required for authentication, other than user name and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性来检索身份验证票证中的自定义值。You use the property to retrieve custom values in the authentication ticket. 属性包含值传递给方法。The property contains the value passed to the method. 通常情况下，此属性用于将使用用户名和密码，如标识号必须经过验证的自定义值传递。Typically, this property is used to pass custom values that must be validated with the user name and password, such as an identification number. 如果多个值存储在该属性，必须分析属性，以便检索值。If more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the property in order to retrieve values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序检索中的用户值对象以自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 传入的值属性存储在窗体身份验证票证的属性。The value passed in the property is stored in the property of the forms authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 应用商店在 cookie 仅当您知道在属性中的数据不是敏感的属性。Store the property in a cookie only when you know that the data in the property is not sensitive. 恶意用户可以访问 cookie 中的值。Malicious users can access the values in the cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示超出当前会话时是否应保留身份验证 Cookie。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained beyond the current session.

value.span: 如果超出当前会话时应保留 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie should be retained beyond the current session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建对象，可以使用属性，指定是否在当前会话中保留身份验证 cookie。When you create a object, you can use the property to specify whether the authentication cookie is retained beyond the current session. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序检索中的用户值对象以自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 的属性对象设置中的值为属性。The property of the object is set to the value in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Password As String
public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the password for the user.

value.span: 用户提供的用于身份验证的密码。

span.span: The password that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性用于检索密码时的身份验证票证中设置自定义值。You use the property to retrieve the password when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 未保存的值身份验证票证中的属性。Do not save the value of the property in the authentication ticket. 恶意用户可以访问 cookie，并检索的密码，即使对 cookie 进行加密。A malicious user can access the cookie and retrieve the password even though the cookie is encrypted.

value.span: 用户提供用于身份验证的名称。

span.span: The name that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用属性来检索身份验证名称时的身份验证票证中设置自定义值。You use the property to retrieve the authentication name when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. 通常情况下，设置的属性对象传递给值。Typically, you set the property of the object to the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序检索中的用户值对象自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 属性设置的值为属性。The property is set to the values of the property.
